BreedLove Beauty Co. Good Skin Elixir

Brand: Breedlove Beauty

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Argan Oil, Rosehip Oil, Tamanu Oil, Neem Oil, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil

Directions: After cleansing, apply 3-5 drops to face and neck, massaging in gentle upward circles. Use daily in place of moisturizer.

Directions: After cleansing, apply 3-5 drops to face and neck, massaging in gentle upward circles. Use daily in place of moisturizer.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
